thread.section_title: Alibaba.com 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Alibaba.com 的点评意见 | www.alibaba.com
thread.title: Sales. Fashion Plus
thread.title_full: Alibaba.com 的点评人 Sales. Fashion Plus

author: Sales. Fashion Plus
title: Sales. Fashion Plus
text:
We are the gold supplier of Alibaba since last 2 years,dealing in chemical lace and fabric.
I believe Alibaba only promotes Chinese supplier,we are not getting any response neither from Alibaba nor from channel partner of Alibaba.
You go for any products and you will always find Chinese suppliers on the top,if Alibaba wants to promotes only Chinese company there is no need to coordinate with any Indian supplier here.
We will definitely not recommend Alibaba to any Indian Supplier.
